Content:: Abbas Ali Mandal (died 26 July 2022) was a Bangladesh Awami League politician who served as Member of Parliament of Joypurhat-1.[1] He died on 26 July 2022 in Shaheed Suhrawardy Medical College & Hospital, Dhaka.[2] Mandal was elected to parliament from Joypurhat-1 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 1986.[3]  This article about a Awami League politician is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
